name: Skin Creator for Minecraft
description:
Create your own skin for Minecraft with this simple editor! Choose from many presets, colorize them and get thousands of possible combinations.

Features
- 3d animated preview
- change body parts visibility
- choose from many random presets
- colorize the skin as you want
- save skin to camera roll
- easy access to Minecraft user profile to upload skins

"Minecraft" is a trademark of Mojang AB.
We are not affiliated with Mojang AB but we adhere to the terms set out by Mojang AB at www.minecraft.net/terms
